full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BSDUS SBYOR SNYING PO'I DGONGS DON GSAL BAR BYED PA KUN GSAL ME LONG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @092B CES KUN MKHYEN BLA MA MCHOG GIS MDZAD PA'I BSDUS SBYOR SNYING PO KUN BSDUS RIGS PA'I MDZOD KYI DGONGS DON GSAL BAR BYED PA KUN GSAL ME LONG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RANG GI GAM GNAS BLO BZANG BSTAR GYIS YANG YANG BSKUL NGOR ^RIGS SMRA YONGS KYI @093A *, ,THA SHAL BLO GROS RGYA MTSOS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O,, ,,MANGGA LAm,, ,, (THUGS RJE SPRIN LAS SPROS PA'I CHAR RGYUN GYIS, ,SNYIGS MA'I DRI MA MA LUS SBYONGS MDZAD PA, ,THUB DBANG YAB SRAS BRGYUD PAR BCAS PA LA, ,SGO GSUM GUS PAS SLAR YANG PHYAG BRGYUD NGO, ,MDO DANG SNGAGS KYI DGONGS DON MA LUS PA, ,MDO RU BSDUS PA BSDUS SBYOR SNYING PO'I DON, ,MDO SOGS GZHUNG DANG SBYAR TE 'GREL PA'I TSUL, ,MDO TZAM BSHAD PA KUN GSAL ME LONG 'DI, ,SKAL BZANG RIGS SMRA YONGS KYI CHA RKYEN DU, ,LAS KHUR BYED PA BKA' BCU BSTAN 'DZIN DANG, ,'BYOR LDAN TSE RING SGRUBS KYIS RKYEN SBYAR TE, ,DON GRUB NOR BU'I GLING DU BAR DU SGRUB, ,'DIS MTSON DGE BAS 'BREL THOGS 'GRO BA KUN, ,TSE RABS PHRENG BAR DAM PAS RJES BZUNG STE, ,TSANG LA MA NOR CHOS KYI SKOR ZHUGS NAS, ,RIGS LAM PHRA MOS RGYAL BSTAN 'DZIN PAR SHOG ,SNGA 'DIS MTSON PAS 'DZIN MA'I KHYON YANGS POR, ,LUNG RIGS DRI MA MED PA'I DGA' STON GYIS, ,'JAM MGON BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN 'DZIN NUS PA'I, ,KHRIMS LDAN DANG MA'I TSOGS KYIS GANG BAR SHOG , ,,(CES BSDUS SBYOR SNYING PO'I 'GREL BA KUN BSAL ME LONG ZHES BYA BA 'DI PO RENG PHYOGS KYI CHOS SDE CHEN PO DON GRUB NOR BU'I GLING NAS BAR DU SGRUB SKABS GAR BYANG SMON TSIG ZHIG DGOS ZHES GZHUNG BRGYA SMRA BA'I RDO RAMS PA BLO BZANG BSAM GTAN GYIS BSKUL NGOR ^BTZUN GZUGS BLO GROS RGYA MTSOS BRIS PA DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,)
